00011 double protectedDivision(const double &a, const double &b) {
00012         if (b == 0.0) {
00013                 return 0.0;
00014         }
00015         else {
00016                 return a / b;
00017         }
00018 }
00019 
00020 ResultType protectedDivision(const ResultType &a, const ResultType &b) {
00021         ResultType ret(a.size());
00022 
00023         for (int i=0; i<ret.size(); i++) {
00024                 if (b[i] == 0.0) {
00025                         ret[i] = 0.0;
00026                 }
00027                 else {
00028                         ret[i] = a[i] / b[i];
00029                 }
00030         }
00031         return ret;
00032 }
00033 
00034 int countHits(const ResultType &targets, const ResultType &guesses, double criterion) {
00035         int ret=0;
00036 
00037         double err = 0.0;
00038         for (int i=0; i<targets.size(); i++) {
00039 
00040                 err = abs(targets[i] - guesses[i]);
00041 
00042                 if (err <= criterion)
00043                         ret++;
00044 
00045         }
00046         return ret;
00047 }

00049 double protectedLog(const double &a) {
00050         if (a <= 0 ) {
00051                 return 0.0;
00052         }
00053         else {
00054                 return log(a);
00055         }
00056 }
00057 
00058 ResultType protectedLog(const ResultType &a) {
00059         ResultType ret(a.size());
00060         for (int i=0; i<ret.size(); i++) {
00061                 if (a[i] <= 0.0) {
00062                         ret[i] = 0.0;
00063                 }
00064                 else {
00065                         ret[i] = log(a[i]);
00066                 }
00067         }
00068         return ret;
00069 }
00070 
00071 int intRandom(const int &low, const int &high) {
00072         int nb = high - low + 1;
00073         return (int)(rng.uniform()*nb + low);
00074 }
00075 
00076 double dblRandom(const double &low, const double &high) {
00077         double nb = high - low + 1;
00078         return (rng.uniform()*nb + low);
00079 }

00086 void createResultType(double value, ResultType &res) {

00088                 res[i] = value;

00101 std::string doubleToString(const double &x)
00102 {
00103         std::ostringstream o;
00104         if (o << x)
00105                 return o.str();
00106         // some sort of error handling goes here...
00107         return "conversion error";

00119 int min (const int &a, const int &b) {
00120         if (a <= b) 
00121                 return a;
00122         else
00123                 return b;
00124 }

00126 void loadFiles(const std::string &training_file, const std::string& testing_file) {
00127 
00128         if (training_file == "" || testing_file == "")
00129         {
00130                 cerr<<"You must supply a training and testing file\n";
00131                 exit(1);
00132         }
00133         else
00134         {       
00135                 // load data
00136 
00137                 ifstream data(training_file.c_str());
00138                 if (!data) {
00139                         cerr << "Could not open training datafile " << training_file << endl;
00140                         exit(1);
00141                 }
00142                 string line;
00143                 getline(data, line); // read first (header) line
00144 
00145                 if (line[0] != '#') { 
00146                         cerr << "Training datafile needs a header line" << endl;
00147                 }
00148                 istringstream is(line);
00149                 is.get(); // skip #
00150                 int ncases;
00151                 int nvars;
00152                 is >> ncases;
00153                 is >> nvars;
00154                 --nvars; // last one is target
00155                 
00156                 // reset global numVariables
00157                 numVariables = nvars;
00158 
00159                 //cout << "Loading training data, ncases = " << ncases << ", nvars = " << nvars << endl;
00160 
00161                 variables.resize(nvars);
00162                 targets.resize(ncases);
00163                 for (int i = 0; i < nvars; ++i) {
00164                         variables[i].resize(ncases);
00165                 }
00166 
00167                 for (int i = 0; i < ncases; ++i) {
00168                         for (int j = 0; j < nvars; ++j) {
00169                                 data >> variables[j][i];
00170                         }
00171 
00172                         data >> targets[i];
00173 
00174                         if (!data) {
00175                                 cerr << "Something went wrong reading in the training data" << endl;
00176                                 cerr << "at line " << i+1 << endl;
00177                                 exit(1);
00178                         }
00179                 }
00180 
00181                 ifstream test_data(testing_file.c_str());
00182                 if (!test_data) {
00183                         cerr << "Could not open testing datafile " << testing_file << endl;
00184                         exit(1);
00185                 }
00186                 getline(test_data, line); //nb: reuse of line
00187                 if (line[0] != '#') { 
00188                         cerr << "Testing datafile needs a header line" << endl;
00189                 }
00190                 istringstream is2(line);
00191                 is2.get(); // reuse of is again (might need a new one)
00192                 is2 >> ncases;
00193                 is2 >> nvars;
00194                 --nvars;
00195 
00196                 //cout << "Loading testing data, ncases = " << ncases << ", nvars = " << nvars << endl;
00197                 test_variables.resize(nvars);
00198                 test_targets.resize(ncases);
00199                 for (int i = 0; i < nvars; ++i) {
00200                         test_variables[i].resize(ncases);
00201                 }
00202                 for (int i=0; i<ncases; i++) {
00203                         for (int j=0; j<nvars; j++) {
00204                                 test_data >> test_variables[j][i];
00205                         }
00206                         test_data >> test_targets[i];
00207 
00208                         if (!test_data) {
00209                                 cerr << "Something went wrong reading in the testing data" << endl;
00210                                 cerr << "at line " << i+1 << endl;
00211                         }
00212                 }
00213                 data.close();
00214                 test_data.close();
00215         }
00216 }

00243 void printHelp(char* arg)
00244 {
00245     cout << "Usage: " << arg << " <options>" << endl << endl;
00246 
00247     cout << "-g num   \t number of generations to run (default = 100) " << endl;
00248     cout << "-p num   \t population size (default = 500) " << endl;
00249     cout << "-t num   \t tournament size (default = 3)" << endl;
00250     cout << "-h       \t help (print this message) " << endl;
00251     cout << endl;
00252     //cout << "-u string\t unaries to use (default = 'vlsc2')" << endl;
00253     cout << "-u string\t unaries to use (default = 'lsc2')" << endl;
00254     //cout << "       \t v : sqrt(x)\n";
00255     cout << "         \t l : ln(x)\n";
00256     cout << "         \t s : sin(x)\n";
00257     cout << "         \t c : cos(x)\n";
00258     cout << "         \t 2 : x*x\n";
00259     cout << "\nBinaries are: x + y, x - y, x * y and x / y\n";
00260     cout << endl;
00261     cout << "-l       \t switches on linear scaling (off by default)\n";
00262     cout << "-D num   \t random seed (default = time(0) ^ (getpid() << 16))\n";
00263     cout << "-o num   \t outputfile for best indy (default = best)\n";
00264     cout << "-d num   \t training data (default = train.dat)\n";
00265     cout << "-f num   \t testing data (default = test.dat)\n";
00266     cout << "-s num   \t maximum size genome (default = 256)\n";
00267     cout << "-r num   \t constant range (default = 10.0)\n";  
00268     cout << "-j num   \t number of constants (default = 20, minimum = 1)\n";
00269     cout << "-O file  \t results file (default: res)\n";
00270     cout << "-c num   \t hits criterion (default: 0.01)\n";
00271     cout << endl;
00272 }
00273 
00274 void setupGlobals(int argc, char* argv[]) {
00275     string optionstring = "g:p:t:hu:lD:o:d:f:s:r:j:LO:c:";
00276     
00277     if (argc == 1) {
00278             printHelp(argv[0]);
00279             exit(1);
00280     }
00281     
00282     while(1)
00283     {
00284         int c = getopt(argc,argv,optionstring.c_str());
00285 
00286         if (c == -1)
00287             break;
00288 
00289         switch(char(c))
00290         {
00291             case 'g': numgens = atoi(optarg); break;
00292             case 'p': popsize = atoi(optarg);break;
00293             case 't': tournamentSize = atoi(optarg); break;
00294             case 'u': unaries = optarg; break;
00295             case 'D': seed = atoi(optarg); seed_specified = true; break;
00296             case 'l': linear_scaling = true; break;
00297             case 'o': best_file = optarg; break;
00298             case 'd': training_file = optarg; break;
00299             case 'f': testing_file = optarg; break;
00300             case 's': genomeSize = atoi(optarg); break;
00301             case 'r': constRange = atof(optarg); break;
00302             case 'j': numConstants = atoi(optarg); break;
00303             case 'L': loose_metric = true; break;
00304             case 'O': logfile = optarg; break;
00305             case 'c': hitsCriterion = (double) atof(optarg); break;
00306             case 'h': printHelp(argv[0]); exit(1);
00307             default:
00308                 printHelp(argv[0]);
00309                 exit(1);
00310         }
00311     }
00312 }

00314 void setupConstants() {
00315         //GPNode *c;
00316         for (int i=0; i<numConstants; i++) {
00317                 constants.push_back(dblRandom(-constRange, constRange));
00318                 //c = new GPNode(i, "constant", -1);
00319                 //t_constants.push_back(*c);
00320                 t_constants.push_back(GPNode(i, "constant", -1));
00321         }
00322 }

00325         //GPNode *vb;
00326         for (int i=0; i<numVariables; i++) {
00327                 //vb = new GPNode(i, "VAR", -1);
00328                 //t_variables.push_back(*vb);
00329                 t_variables.push_back(GPNode(i, "VAR", -1));
00330         }
00331 }

00333 void setupBinaries() {
00334         //GPNode *binary1 = new GPNode(0, "ADD", 1);
00335         //t_binaries.push_back(*binary1);
00336         
00337         t_binaries.push_back(GPNode(0, "ADD", 1));
00338         t_binaries.push_back(GPNode(1, "MIN", 1));
00339         t_binaries.push_back(GPNode(2, "MUL", 1));
00340         t_binaries.push_back(GPNode(3, "DIV", 1));

00350 void setupUnaries() {
00351         //GPNode *u;
00352         for (unsigned i = 0; i < unaries.size(); ++i) {
00353                 switch (unaries[i]) {
00354                         //case 'v': t_unaries.push_back(GPNode(i, "SQRT", 0)); break;
00355                         case 'l': t_unaries.push_back(GPNode(i, "LOG", 0)); break;
00356                         case 's': t_unaries.push_back(GPNode(i, "SIN", 0)); break;
00357                         case 'c': t_unaries.push_back(GPNode(i, "COS", 0)); break;
00358                         case '2': t_unaries.push_back(GPNode(i, "SQR", 0)); break;
00359                         default: std::cerr << "Problem processing unaries\n"; printHelp("prog"); exit(1); 
00360                 }
00361         }
00362 }

00367         setupBinaries();

00378 void printSettings() {
00379         cout << "Run settings:\n";
00380         cout << "------------------------------------------" << endl;
00381         cout << "population size:       " << popsize << endl;
00382         cout << "genome size:           " << genomeSize << endl;
00383         cout << "number of generations: " << numgens << endl;
00384         cout << "crossover rate:        " << crossover_prob << endl;
00385         cout << "mutation rate:         " << mutation_prob << endl;
00386         cout << "tournament size:       " << tournamentSize << endl;
00387         cout << "number of constants:   " << numConstants << endl;
00388         cout << "number of variables:   " << numVariables << endl;
00389         cout << "constant range:        " << constRange << endl;
00390         cout << "random seed:           " << seed << endl;
00391         cout << "hits criterion:        " << hitsCriterion << endl;
00392         cout << "------------------------------------------" << endl;
00393 }
